about_the_game:
Oh, a shooting star! I wish something would happen...

Solene's Spin Story is an action-puzzle game in which two inseparable stars, Solene and Sélène, set off in search of a shooting star that has struck and injured Sélène. Make your way through increasingly demanding levels with more and more convoluted paths and more and more surprising obstacles to reach the exit!

WARNING: Sélène is injured and must avoid touching anything!

Will you be able to catch up with this nasty shooting star and recover the missing piece of Selene?

Key features

  • +70 levels full of obstacles (and shortcuts!)

  • The story told in the form of a drawn tale

  • Adventure mode with 6 unique and colorful worlds (and a timer! It's up to you to beat the best times!)

  • A more difficult Challenge mode where the goal is to collect all the “Sun Stickers”, with special gimmicks such as:

    • A greater orbit for Selene

    • A ghostly Solene capable of passing through walls

    • Multiple Moons in different orbits

    • And much more!

  • Intuitive handling and short levels for immediate enjoyment

short_description: In this action-puzzle game, you control Solene, a sunny little star, and navigate cramped and treacherous levels to find the exit. Your best friend Sélène, perpetually in orbit around you, is injured, so watch out for the slightest bump against a wall or obstacle!
